title.bg: Habari yako. Jina langu ni …………………… na nakupigia kutoka TIFA Research, kampuni ya utafiti wa soko nchini Kenya. Ningependa kuchukua dakika 10 hadi 15 za wakati wako kukuuliza maswali machache kuhusu Covid-19 na jinsi mashirika yanajibu nchini Kenya. Ningependa pia kukuhakikishia kwamba habari zote ambazo utatupatia zitatumiwa kwa usiri. Je, ungependa kuendelea?
title.default: Good morning/afternoon, my name is ………………………….and I am calling you from TIFA Research, a market research company in Kenya.  I would like to take 10 to 15 minutes of your time to ask a few questions on the Covid-19 and how organizations are responding in Kenya. I would also like to assure you that all the information that you share with use will be treated with confidentiality. Do you want to continue?

text.bg: Ndiyo
text.default: Yes

text.bg: La
text.default: No

elements.name: Exit1

title.default: A6. What is your current employment situation?

text.bg: Nimeajiriwa wakati wote- kama bado anafanya kazi kwa wakati wote / sehemu ya muda
text.default: Employed full-time– whether still working full-time/part-time

text.bg: Hana kazi / kutopata mapato: nilipoteza kazi katika mwezi mmoja uliopita

text.bg: Sina kazi wala sijawahi kuajiriwa
text.default: Jobless have never been employed

text.bg: Nimejiajiri na bado nafanya kazi

elements.description: SINGLE RESPONSE – DO NOT READ BUT PROMPT TO GET NECESSARY DETAILS

text.bg: Kuenea kwa Covid-19
text.default: Spread of Covid-19

text.bg: Athari za Covid-19 kwenye uchumi wa Kenya
text.default: Impact of Covid-19 on Kenya’s economy

text.bg: Kupoteza mapatu kwa sababu ya Covid-19
text.default: Loss of income due to Covid-19

text.bg: Upimaji wa hiari wa Covid-19
text.default: Voluntary testing for Covid-19

text.bg: Muendelezo wa saa ya kurudi (curfew) kwa siku nyingine 30
text.default: Curfew continuation for another 30 days

text.bg: Kutokuwa na uwezo wa kusafiri kutoka kaunti moja hadi nyingine
text.default: Inability to move from one county to another

text.bg: Maswala ya kisiasa karibu na uchaguzi mkuu wa 2022
text.default: Political activity around the 2022 presidential elections

text.bg: Kufungwa kwa shule na taasisi nyingine za elimu
text.default: Closure of schools and other educational institutions

title.bg: Q1. Unajali kwa kiwango kipi juu ya yafuatayo
title.default: Q1. How concerned are you about the following?

text.bg: Sijali sana
text.default: Not too concerned

text.bg: Najali kidogo
text.default: Somewhat concerned

text.bg: Najali sana
text.default: Very concerned

elements.name: Q2

title.bg: Q2. Ukitafuta Habari kuhusu virusi vya Korona, ni vyanzo gani unaangalia/ kuamini Zaidi?
title.default: Q2.	When you are looking for information about coronavirus, what sources do you look to/trust the most?

text.bg: Wizara ya Afya na wataalam wake wa matibabu
text.default: Ministry of Health and its medical experts,

text.bg: Rais
text.default: The President

text.bg: Serikali za kaunti (Magavana kutoka kaunti tofauti, mawaziri wa kaunti)
text.default: County Governments (Governors from different counties, County Ministers)

text.bg: Wanasiasa (Wabunge, maseneta, wawakilishi wa wanawake, MCAs)
text.default: Politicians ( MPs, Senators, Women Rep, MCAs)

text.bg: Vyombo vya habari (kama runinga, magazeti, redio)
text.default: Media (e.g., TV, newspapers, radio)

text.bg: Mtandao wa kijamii
text.default: Social media

text.bg: Mashirika yasiyo ya serikali (NGOs)
text.default: Non-governmental organizations (NGOs)

text.bg: Makampuni ya kitaifa/ biashara
text.default: National companies or businesses

text.bg: Wizara zingine za serikali na mashirika (Wizara ya Mambo ya ndani, Chifu)
text.default: Other government ministries and agencies (Ministry of Interior, Chiefs)

text.bg: Asasi za kidini
text.default: Religious or faith-based organizations

elements.description: [Select as many as apply] DO NOT READ OUT

title.bg: Q3. Je, ni viwanda gani unaamini vinafanya kazi bora kuunga mkono juhudi za coronavirus?
title.default: Q3.	What industries do you believe are doing the best job supporting coronavirus efforts?

text.bg: Huduma za Chakula (k.v, maduka makubwa, mikahawa, baa, nk)
text.default: Food Services (e.g., supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, pub chains, etc.)

text.bg: Kampuni za mawasiliano ya simu (kwa mfano, simu za rununu na kampuni za mtandao
text.default: Telecommunications (e.g mobile phone and internet companies)

text.bg: Kampuni za utunzaji wa afya (k.m hospitali na kampuni za dawa)
text.default: Health care companies (e.g hospitals and pharmaceuticals)

text.bg: Duka za rejareja / za jumla za bidhaa (wachuuzi, vibanda, na duka)
text.default: Retail/general merchandise stores (hawkers, kiosks, and duka’s)

text.bg: Huduma za kifedha (kwa mfano, benki)
text.default: Financial services (e.g banking)

text.bg: Viwanda
text.default: Manufacturing

text.bg: Vyombo vya habari, magazeti na matangazo- redio, Runinga
text.default: Media, newspapers and broadcasting- radio, TV

text.bg: Usafiri (mabasi na matatu)
text.default: Transportation (buses and matatu’s)

text.bg: Mashirika yasiyo ya serikali
text.default: NGOs

text.bg: Wasanii – waimbaji na wachekeshaji
text.default: Artist – Musician and Comedians

title.bg: Q4. Katika sentensi 1-2, ni kampuni/ chapa gani TATU ambazo unadhani zinafanya kazi bora zaidi kusaidia juhudi za kupambana na Korona, fafanua kwa nini.
title.default: Q4.	In 1-2 sentences, give THREE companies/brand that you think are doing the best job supporting coronavirus efforts right now, and explain why.

title.bg: Jina la kampuni
title.default: Name of company

title.bg: Sababu ya uteuzi
title.default: Reason for selection

text.bg: Jinsi kampuni zinavyofanya kazi sasa itaathiri mtazamo wangu juu yao katika siku zijazo
text.default: How companies act now will impact my perception of them in the future

text.bg: Naamini biashara ambazo zinaweka kipaumbele juhudi za misaada ya coronavirus na suluhisho zitarudi haraka baada ya janga la coronavirus kumalizika
text.default: I believe businesses that are prioritizing coronavirus relief efforts and solutions will bounce back faster after the coronavirus pandemic is over

text.bg: Ninaamini kampuni lazima zifanye maamuzi ambayo ni kwa faida ya wafanyikazi wao, kwa mfano, kutowarudisha wafanyikazi kazini ikiwa wanaona sio salama, hata ikiwa hiyo inamaanisha kupoteza biashara)
text.default: I believe companies must make the decisions that are in the interest of their employees, (e.g., not sending employees back to work if they feel it’s unsafe, even if that means losing business)

text.bg: Ninaamini kampuni lazima zifanye maamuzi ambayo ni kwa faida ya jamii pana sasa
text.default: I believe companies must make the decisions that are in the interest of the broader community right now

text.bg: Nadhani biashara inaweza kuunda suluhisho bora / ya haraka kuhusu coronavirus kuliko serikali
text.default: I think business can create better/faster coronavirus solutions than government

text.bg: Nina imani zaidi katika biashara au sekta binafsi kutatua janga la coronavirus kuliko vyombo vingine (kwa mfano, serikali, mashirika yasiyo ya faida)
text.default: I have more faith in business or private sector to solve the coronavirus pandemic than other entities (e.g., government, nonprofits)

text.bg: Nadhani gonjwa la coronavirus litalazimisha kampuni kutanguliza mahitaji ya wadau wao (kama waajiriwa, jamii), sio tu ujira wa kifedha, kwa muda mrefu
text.default: I think the coronavirus pandemic will force companies to prioritize the needs of their stakeholders (e.g., employees, communities), not just the financial reward, in the long-term

text.bg: Ninahisi kwamba kampuni zinazoendeshwa na kusudi (hiyo ni, biashara ambazo hutengeneza pesa wakati huo huo huchangia ustawi wa jamii yetu na mazingira) zimekuwa bora wakati wa janga la coronavirus
text.default: I feel that “PURPOSE-DRIVEN” companies (i.e., businesses that make money while at the same time contribute to the well-being of our society and the environment) have fared better during the coronavirus pandemic

title.bg: Q5. Unakubaliana na kauli hizi kwa kiwango gani?
title.default: Q5.	How much do you agree with the following statements?

text.bg: Nakubaliana kabisa
text.default: Strongly agree

text.bg: Nakubaliana kiasi
text.default: Somewhat agree

text.bg: Sina maoni
text.default: Neutral

text.bg: Sikubaliani kiasi
text.default: Somewhat disagree

text.bg: Sikubaliani kabisa
text.default: Strongly disagree

title.bg: Kwa "inayoendeshwa na kusudi", tunamaanisha kampuni inayojitahidi kuleta athari chanya/mzuri katika jamii, zaidi ya kupata pesa tu ". Hiyo ni, kwa kujali mazingira, inasaidia mikakati ya kijamii, inachangia pesa kwa mipango ya afya, hujali wafanyikazi wake… na kadhalika.
title.default: By “purpose-driven”, we mean a company that strives to make a positive impact in society, beyond just making money”. That is, by caring for the environment, supports social causes, contributes money for health programs, cares for its employees… etc.

text.bg: Nitakumbuka kampuni zilizoinuka kutoa msaada wa Korona wakati haya yote yamekamilika
text.default: I will remember which companies stepped up to provide coronavirus support when this is all over

text.bg: Nitakumbuka kampuni ambazo zilifanya maamuzi mabaya wakati wa janga la coronavirus (kwa mfano, maamuzi ambayo yameathiri vibaya wafanyikazi wake, wateja, jamii)
text.default: I will remember the companies that made bad decisions during the coronavirus pandemic (e.g., decisions that negatively impacted its employees, customers, community)

text.bg: Nitakumbuka viongozi wa biashara ambao waliibuka na kusaidia wakati wa janga la coronavirus
text.default: I will remember the business leaders who stepped up and helped during the coronavirus pandemic

text.bg: Nina uwezekano mkubwa wa kuamini kampuni ambazo zinatoa msaada wa coronavirus
text.default: I am more likely to trust companies that are providing coronavirus support

text.bg: Nina uwezekano mkubwa wa kusaidia / kuwa mwaminifu kwa kampuni ambazo zinatoa msaada wa coronavirus
text.default: I am more likely to support/be loyal to companies that are providing coronavirus support

text.bg: Nina uwezekano mkubwa wa kununua kutoka kwa kampuni ambazo zinatoa msaada wa coronavirus
text.default: I am more likely to purchase from companies that are providing coronavirus support

text.bg: Ningekuwa na pesa nyingi kuwekeza katika hisa, nina uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwekeza katika kampuni ambazo zinatoa msaada wa coronavirus
text.default: If I had a lot of money to invest in shares, I am more likely to invest in companies that are providing coronavirus support

text.bg: Nina uwezekano mkubwa wa kutaka kufanya kazi kwa kampuni ambazo zinatoa msaada wa coronavirus
text.default: I am more likely to want to work for companies that are providing coronavirus support

title.bg: Q6. Unakubaliana na kauli hizi kwa kiwango gani?
title.default: Q6.	How much do you agree with the following statements?

text.bg: Nakubaiana zaidi
text.default: Strongly agree

text.bg: Nakubaliana kiasi
text.default: Somewhat agree

text.bg: Sina maoni
text.default: Neutral

text.bg: Sikubaliani kiasi
text.default: Somewhat disagree

text.bg: Sikubaliani kabisa
text.default: Strongly disagree

title.bg: Q7. Unajifunza wapi juu ya / kutafuta habari kuhusu majibu ya kampuni kwa Koroba na juhudi za msaada?
title.default: Q7.	Where do you learn about/look for information about companies’ coronavirus responses and support efforts?

text.bg: Kwenye bidhaa au kifurushi chake / lebo
text.default: On the product or its package/label

text.bg: Katika duka au kutoka kwa wafanyikazi wa kampuni
text.default: In-store or from a company’s employees

text.bg: Barua pepe
text.default: Email

text.bg: Hadithi za vyombo vya habari au mahojiano (k.v., kwenye habari au kwenye gazeti la hapa)
text.default: Media stories or interviews (e.g., on the news or in the local paper)

text.bg: Matangazo (kwa mfano, matangazo ya Runinga, matangazo ya kuchapisha au mkondoni, n.k.)
text.default: Advertisements (e.g., TV commercials, print or online ads, etc.)

text.bg: Matangazo (kwa mfano, matangazo ya Runinga, matangazo ya kuchapisha au mkondoni, n.k.)
text.default: The company’s website

text.bg: Mitandao ya kijamii (k.m., Facebook, Instagram, au Twitter, WhatsApp)
text.default: Social media (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter, WhatsApp)

text.bg: Watu mashuhuri, wanasiasa, au washawishi wa mitandao ya kijamii
text.default: Celebrities, politicians, or social media influencers

text.bg: Ninasikia vizuri juu ya kampuni ambazo zinatangaza hadharani kile wanachofanya ili kutoa msaada wa coronavirus (k.v. Kubadilisha viwanda kutengeneza PPE, sanitizer, na kutowafuta kazi wafanyikazi wowote)
text.default: I feel better about companies that publicly announce what they are doing to provide coronavirus support (e.g., converting manufacturing plants to make PPEs, sanitizers, not laying off any employees)

text.bg: Nina uwezekano mkubwa wa kuamini juhudi za msaada wa kampuni ni halisi nikisikia kutoka kwa vyanzo vingine (k.v. kutoka kwa vyombo vya habari, serikali au washawishi) dhidi ya kusikia kutoka kwa kampuni yenyewe
text.default: I am more likely to believe a company’s coronavirus support efforts are authentic if I hear about it from third-party sources (e.g., from media, government, influencers) vs. from the company itself

text.bg: Ninauliza ukweli au uhalisi wa juhudi za msaada wa Korona wa kampuni fulani
text.default: I question the sincerity/authenticity of some companies’ coronavirus support efforts

text.bg: Kampuni ambazo zinakuza bidhaa / huduma ambazo hazihusiani na juhudi za Korona zinaonekana kujishughulisha au kutojali
text.default: Companies that are promoting products/services not related to coronavirus efforts look self-serving or uncaring

text.bg: Nina maoni bora ya biashara na makampuni, kwa ujumla, kwa sababu ya jinsi walivyoinuka wakati wa janga la Korona
text.default: I have a better opinion of business and companies, in general, because of how they have stepped up during the coronavirus pandemic

text.bg: Nataka kampuni zaidi zianze kuongea juu ya zinavyofanya ili kurudisha hali ya kawaida baada ya janga la Korona
text.default: I want more companies to start talking about how they are working to get things back to normal after the coronavirus pandemic

text.bg: Nadhani ni mapema sana kwa kampuni kuongea juu ya kurudisha hali ya kawaida baada ya janga la Korona
text.default: I think it’s too soon for companies to be talking about getting things back to normal after the coronavirus pandemic

text.bg: Hata wakati wa janga la coronavirus, ninatarajia kampuni kuendelea na juhudi za maswala ya kijamii na mazingira (k.v. njaa, afya ya ulimwengu, mabadiliko ya hali ya hewa)
text.default: Even during the coronavirus pandemic, I expect companies to continue efforts around social and environmental issues (e.g., hunger, global health, climate change)

title.bg: Q8. Unakubaliana na kauli hizi kwa kiwango gani?
title.default: Q8.	How much do you agree with the following statements?

text.bg: Nakubaliana zaidi
text.default: Strongly agree

text.bg: Nakubaliana kiasi
text.default: Somewhat agree

text.bg: Sina maoni
text.default: Neutral

text.bg: Sikubaliani kiasi
text.default: Somewhat disagree

text.bg: Sikubaliani kabisa
text.default: Strongly disagree

elements.name: Q9

title.bg: Q9. Ni yapi yafuatayo ni njia bora kwa kampuni kusaidia wakati wa janga la coronavirus?
title.default: Q9.	Which of the following are the best ways for companies to help during the coronavirus pandemic?

text.bg: Kuhakikisha kuwa wafanyikazi wao wanaendelea kupokea mshahara na faida
text.default: Ensuring that their own employees continue receiving salary and benefits

text.bg: Kutekeleza sera za kulinda afya na usalama wa wafanyikazi wao
text.default: Implementing policies to protect the health and safety of their own employees

text.bg: Kuondoa kwa muda ada au vizuizi kwa ufikiaji wa huduma zao (k.v. kuvuja ada ya malipo ya kuchelewa kwa bili, kutoa ufikiaji wa bure kwa huduma ambazo kawaida hulipa, nk.)
text.default: Temporarily eliminating fees or barriers to access for their services (e.g., waiving late payments fees for bills, offering free access to services that you normally pay for, etc.)

text.bg: Kuendesha biashara kama kawaida, kuhakikisha mwendelezo wa huduma na "hali ya kawaida"
text.default: Conducting business as usual, to ensure continuity of services and “normalcy”

text.bg: Kutoa pesa kwa juhudi za misaada (k.v., kutoa pesa kwa mahospitali, jamii, watu binafsi, mashirika yasiyo ya faida, au mashirika ya misaada ya serikali)
text.default: Donating money to relief efforts (e.g., donating cash to hospitals,   communities, individuals, nonprofits, or government aid agencies)

text.bg: Kutoa bidhaa au huduma kwa juhudi za misaada (k.v., kutoa bidhaa kama chakula au huduma kwa hospitali, jamii, watu binafsi, mashirika yasiyo ya faida, au mashirika ya serikali ya misaada )
text.default: Donating products or services to relief efforts (e.g., donating products  such as food or services to hospitals, communities, individuals, nonprofits, or government aid agencies)

text.bg: Kutumia majengo/ vifaa vyao na wakati wa wafanyikazi wao kusaidia katika juhudi za kutoa misaada (k.v. kutengeneza/ kusambaza vifaa muhimu kama vile sanitizer, vituo vya kuosha mikono na vifuniko vya hewa)
text.default: Using their buildings/equipment and employee time to aid in relief efforts (e.g., producing/distributing critical supplies such as sanitizers, hand washing stations and ventilators)

text.bg: Kutoa habari au fursa zinazotusaidia kujitunza na kuwa na afya
text.default: Providing information or opportunities that help us take care of ourselves and stay healthy

text.bg: Kutumia rasilimali za matangazo na uuzaji kuwasiliana habari za afya ya umma
text.default: Using advertising and marketing resources to communicate public health information

noneText.bg: Hakuna hata mmoja wa hii - sidhani kama ni jukumu la kampuni kusaidia wakati wa janga la coronavirus
noneText.default: None of these – I don’t think that it is the responsibility of companies to help during the coronavirus pandemic

elements.description: Select as many as apply. READ OUT

title.bg: Q10. Ikiwa ungetaka kutoa wakati au pesa kwa juhudi za misaada ya coronavirus (au ikiwa tayari unayo), ni yapi ya yafuatayo ungepatia kipaumbele?
title.default: Q10.	If you were going to donate time or money to coronavirus relief efforts (or if you already have), which of the following would you prioritize?

text.bg: Mashirika yasiyo ya serikali ya hapa (NGOs), kwa sababu ya jinsi coronavirus inayoathiri jamii yangu
text.default: Local NGOs, because of the impact coronavirus is having on my community

text.bg: Mashirika yasiyo ya faida ya kimataifa, kwa sababu ya jinsi inavyoathiri ulimwengu wote
text.default: Global nonprofits, because of the impact coronavirus is having across the world

text.bg: Juhudi za misaada ya njaa (k.m. vyakula kwa walio na shida  au walio katika hatari kubwa ambao hawawezi kupata duka la mboga wakati huu)
text.default: Hunger relief efforts (e.g., meals and food items for disadvantaged individuals or high-risk individuals who are not able to access grocery stores at this time)

text.bg: Msaada wa wafanyikazi wa huduma ya afya (k.m., pesa kusaidia wafanyikazi wa afya kununua vifaa vinavyohitajika kama vifaa vya kinga vya kibinafsi)
text.default: Healthcare workforce support (e.g., funds to help healthcare workers buy needed supplies such as personal protective equipment)

text.bg: Huduma ya wazee (k.m. rasilimali na utunzaji haswa kwa raia wazee kama vile milo, vituo vya ukaguzi, n.k)
text.default: Elderly care (e.g., resources and care specifically for elderly citizens such as meals, check-ins, etc.)

text.bg: Ufikiaji wa huduma ya afya (k.v., Msaada kwa watu ambao hawana chanjo kidogo ya huduma ya afya kupata huduma ya afya, upimaji, n.k.)
text.default: Healthcare access (e.g., help for individuals who have little or no healthcare coverage to get the healthcare, testing, etc.)

text.bg: Msaada kwa watoto (k.m. fedha au programu zilizopewa mahsusi kwa watoto walioathiriwa na ugonjwa wa Korona, ambao wanaweza kukosa huduma ya afya ya watoto au ufikiaji wa milo)
text.default: Aid for children (e.g., funds or programs specifically dedicated to children impacted by coronavirus, who may not have childcare or access to meals)

text.bg: Huduma kwa wafanyikazi waliohamishwa (k.m., programu au msaada wa kifedha kwa watu waliopoteza kazi kwa sababu ya janga la coronavirus)
text.default: Services for displaced workers (e.g., programs or financial support for individuals who lost their job as a result of the coronavirus pandemic)

text.bg: Msaada wa biashara ndogo (k.m., pesa kusaidia biashara ndogo kubaki kwenye biashara)
text.default: Small business support (e.g., funds to help small businesses stay in business)

noneText.bg: Hakuna hata haya - hata kama ningependa kuchangia zaidi kwa juhudi za uokoaji wa coronavirus, nina wasiwasi sana juu ya fedha zangu / uchumi wakati huu.
noneText.default: None of these – even if I would like to donate more to coronavirus relief efforts, I’m too worried about my finances/the economy at this time

text.bg: Ikiwa ningesikia kampuni yangu ikifanya jambo la kusaidia juhudi za uokoaji wa coronavirus, itanifanya nijisifu kufanyia kazi kampuni yangu
text.default: If I heard my company was doing something to support coronavirus relief efforts, it would make me feel proud to work for my company

text.bg: Ikiwa ningesikia kampuni yangu ikifanya jambo la kusaidia juhudi za uokoaji wa coronavirus, itanifanya nitake kuhusika
text.default: If I heard my company was doing something to support coronavirus relief efforts, it would make me want to get involved

text.bg: Ikiwa ningesikia kampuni yangu ikifanya jambo la kusaidia juhudi za uokoaji wa coronavirus, itanifanya nijisikie mwaminifu zaidi kwa kampuni yangu
text.default: If I heard my company was doing something to support coronavirus relief efforts, it would make me feel more loyal to my company

text.bg: Ikiwa ningesikia kampuni yangu ikifanya jambo la kusaidia juhudi za uokoaji wa coronavirus, itanifanya uwezekano mkubwa wa kupendekeza kampuni yangu kwa wengine
text.default: If I heard my company was doing something to support coronavirus relief efforts, it would make me more likely to recommend my company to others

text.bg: Ikiwa ningesikia kampuni yangu ikifanya kitu kuunga mkono juhudi za uokoaji wa coronavirus, itanitia msukumo
text.default: If I heard my company was doing something to support coronavirus relief efforts, it would make me feel inspired

text.bg: Nadhani kampuni yangu inaweza kufanya zaidi kusaidia wafanyikazi wakati wa janga la coronavirus
text.default: I think my company could be doing more to support employees during the coronavirus 	pandemic

text.bg: Nadhani kampuni yangu inafanya kazi nzuri kusaidia jamii wakati wa janga la coronavirus
text.default: I think my company is doing a good job supporting the community during the 	coronavirus pandemic

text.bg: Nadhani kampuni yangu inapaswa kuchukua hatua haraka kuweka mipango / sera mpya katika kukabiliana na janga la coronavirus
text.default: I think my company should have acted faster to put new programs/policies in place in 	response to the coronavirus pandemic

title.bg: Q11. Je, unakubaliana na kauli hizi kwa kiwango gani?
title.default: Q11.	How much do you agree with the following statements?

text.bg: Nakubaliana zaidi
text.default: Strongly agree

text.bg: Nakubaliana kiasi
text.default: Somewhat agree

text.bg: Sina maoni
text.default: Neutral

text.bg: Sikubaliani kiasi
text.default: Somewhat   disagree

text.bg: Sikubaliani kabisa
text.default: Strongly disagree

title.bg: Q12. Je! Ni chama gani cha siasa au umoja unaunga mkono au unahisi karibu zaidi, ikiwa kipo?
title.default: Q12. Which political party or coalition do you support or feel closest to, if any?

title.bg: Q13. Ikiwa kulikuwa na chama chochote cha siasa uliouunga mkono hapo zamani, kilikuwa ni kipi, au cha hivi karibuni zaidi ikiwa ulikuwa umeunga mkono zaidi ya chama kimoja katika miaka iliyopita?
title.default: Q13. If there was any political party you supported in the past, what was it, or the most recent one if you had supported more than one of them over the years?

title.bg: Q14. Unaunga mkono kufanya mabadiliko yoyote kwa Katiba kabla ya uchaguzi ujao?
title.default: Q14. Do you support making any changes to the Constitution before the next election?

text.bg: Ndiyo
text.default: Yes

text.bg: La
text.default: No

text.bg: Sina uhakika
text.default: Not sure

text.bg: Hajatoa jibu
text.default: No response

elements.name: Q15

title.bg: Q15. Ikiwa kutakuwa na mabadiliko yoyote kwa Katiba ya 2010, ni yapi matatu ambayo ungeunga mkono kwa dhati ikiwa mengine yamependekezwa?
title.default: Q15. If there are going to be any changes to the 2010 Constitution, which three would you most strongly support if some are proposed?

text.bg: kupungua kwa idadi ya kaunti na / au maeneo bunge
text.default: reduction in the number of counties and/or constituencies

text.bg: Mabadiliko ya mfumo wa sasa wa urais kuwa wa ubunge / mabadiliko katika mfumo wa Utendaji (Executive) ili (a) Rais Uhuru aweze kuongoza nchi baada ya uchaguzi ujao kama waziri mkuu
text.default: change of the current presidential system to a parliamentary one/change in the system of the Executive so that (a) President Uhuru could lead the country after the next election as prime minister

text.bg: ibadilishwe ili kuongeza idadi ya nafasi za Utendaji ili kufanya mfumo ujumuishe watu zaidi
text.default: change it to increase the number of Executive positions to make the system more inclusive

text.bg: Kuongezewa kwa mapato yanayopewa kaunti
text.default: increase in revenue allocated to the counties

text.bg: uhamishaji wa jukumu la pamoja la huduma za matibabu kutoka kaunti kwenda serikali ya kitaifa tu
text.default: transfer of shared responsibility for medical services from counties to national government only

text.bg: mabadiliko ya kuhakikisha utekelezaji wa sharti la jinsia (hiyo ni, sio zaidi ya 2/3 ya jinsia yoyote katika chombo chochote cha uchaguzi)
text.default: changes to ensure implementation of the gender requirement  (i.e., no more than 2/3 of either gender in any elective body)

text.bg: Njia mpya ya uteuzi wa makamishna wa IEBC / kubadilishwa kwa IEBC ya sasa
text.default: new method of appointment of IEBC commissioners/replacement of current IEBC

text.bg: mabadiliko katika mfumo wa uchaguzi kutoka kwa mshindi-anachukua-yote kuwa uwakilishi wa usawa
text.default: change in the electoral system from the current winner-takes-all to a PR (proportional representation) one

text.bg: kuongezeka kwa nguvu kwa vyombo vya uchunguzi-ufisadi / mashtaka
text.default: increased power to corruption-investigation/prosecution bodies

text.bg: Sina uhakika
text.default: Not sure

text.bg: Sijui yoyote
text.default: Don’t know any

elements.description: 3 RESPONSES – DO NOT READ – PROBE IF NECESSARY FOR CLARITY BUT IF UNCLEAR RECORD AS “OTHER”

title.bg: Q16. Kwa ujumla, je, unaunga mkono 'handshake' kati ya Rais Uhuru na Waziri Mkuu wa zamani wa Raila?
title.default: Q16. Overall, do you support the ‘hand-shake’ between President Uhuru and former Prime Minister Raila?

text.bg: Ndiyo
text.default: Yes

text.bg: La
text.default: No

text.bg: Sina uhakika
text.default: Not Sure

text.bg: Hajatoa jibu
text.default: No response

title.bg: Q17. Ikiwa hakuna mabadiliko kwa Katiba, ikimaanisha kuwa Rais Kenyatta lazima ajiuzulu mnamo 2022 na Rais ajaye atachaguliwa na wapiga kura, unafikiria ni nani Rais Kenyatta atamuunga mkono kama Rais ajaye?
title.default: Q17. If there is no change to the Constitution, meaning President Kenyatta must retire in 2022 and the next president will be elected by voters, whom do you think President Kenyatta will support to be the next president?

title.bg: Q18. Na nani unataka kumpigia kura kama rais ajaye baada ya Uhuru kustaafu?
title.default: Q18. And who do you want to vote for as the next president after Uhuru retires?

title.bg: Q19. Ukipewa chaguzi kati ya wagombea wawili wafuatao wa urais katika uchaguzi ujao, ni nani angempigia kura kati ya:
title.default: Q19. Given a choice between the following two presidential candidates in the next election, whom would you vote for between:

elements.name: Q19.1
elements.title: Q19.1. Raila vs. Ruto?

elements.name: Q19.2
elements.title: Q19.2. Ruto vs. Kalonzo?

elements.name: Q19.3
elements.title: Q19.3. Mudavadi vs. Ruto?

elements.name: Q19.4
elements.title: Q19.4. Mudavadi vs. Raila?

elements.name: Q19.5
elements.title: Q19.5. Ruto vs. Alfred Mutua

elements.name: Q19.6
elements.title: Q19.6. Raila vs. Gideon Moi

elements.name: Q19.7
elements.title: Q19.7. Gideon vs. Mudavadi?

elements.name: Q19.8
elements.title: Q19.8. Kalonzo vs. Mudavadi?

elements.name: Q19.9
elements.title: Q19.9. Ruto vs. Matiang’i?

elements.name: Q19.10
elements.title: Q19.10. Martha Karua vs Ruto?

elements.name: Q19.11
elements.title: Q19.11. Martha Karua vs Gideon Moi?

title.bg: Q20. Ikiwa ulipiga kura, ulimpigia kura nani kama Rais katika Uchaguzi Mkuu wa Agosti 2017?
title.default: Q20. If you voted, whom did you vote for as president in the August 2017 General Election?

title.bg: Q21. Kuhusu hatma ya DP William Ruto, ni yapi yafuatayo ni karibu na maoni yako mwenyewe?
title.default: Q21. Regarding the future of DP William Ruto, which of the following is closest to your own view?

text.bg: Anapaswa kugombea urais mnamo 2022
text.default: He should contest the presidency in 2022

text.bg: Haifai kugombea mnamo 2022 lakini badala yake asubiri hadi 2027
text.default: He should not contest in 2022 but instead wait until 2027

text.bg: Anapaswa kumuunga mkono mgombea mwingine wa chaguo lake
text.default: He should support another candidate of his choice

text.bg: Anapaswa kustaafu kutoka kwa siasa kabisa
text.default: He should retire from politics completely

text.bg: Hajatoa jibu
text.default: No response
